history.proof: intros n h H. unfold is_n_stream. split. - apply fstn_stream_None. reflexivity. - intros n' H0. hauto lq: on use: @fstn_stream_Some unfold: is_at_least_n_stream.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type n : nat h : stream A H : is_at_least_n_stream n h n' : nat H0 : n' < n H1 : n <= n' Unable to unify "{?M1918 <= ?M1919} + {?M1919 < ?M1918}" with "exist (fun h : nat -> option A => forall x y : nat, x < y -> h x = None -> h y = None) (fun m : nat => if le_lt_dec n m then None else h m) (fun (x y : nat) (H : x < y) (H0 : (if le_lt_dec n x then None else h x) = None) => fstn_stream_obligation_1 A n h x y H H0) n' = None -> False".
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment A : Type n : nat h : stream A H : is_at_least_n_stream n h n' : nat H0, H1 : n' < n Unable to unify "is_at_least_n_stream n h" with "exist (fun h : nat -> option A => forall x y : nat, x < y -> h x = None -> h y = None) (fun m : nat => if le_lt_dec n m then None else h m) (fun (x y : nat) (H : x < y) (H0 : (if le_lt_dec n x then None else h x) = None) => fstn_stream_obligation_1 A n h x y H H0) n' <> None".

original: intros n h H. unfold is_n_stream. split. - apply fstn_stream_None. reflexivity. - intros n' H0. unfold fstn_stream. destruct (le_lt_dec n n') as [H1|H1]. + apply le_lt_dec. auto. + apply H. auto.
